{{ddcl|header=cwctype|
std::wctrans_t wctrans( const char* str );
}}

Constructs a value of type {{c|std::wctrans_t}} that describes a {{lc|LC_CTYPE}} category of wide character mapping. It may be one of the standard mappings, or a locale-specific mapping, such as {{tt|"tojhira"}} or {{tt|"tojkata"}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|str|C string holding the name of the desired mapping.
The following values of {{tt|str}} are supported in all C locales:
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Value of {{tt|str}}|Effect}}
{{dsc|{{tt|"toupper"}}|identifies the mapping used by {{c|towupper}}}}
{{dsc|{{tt|"tolower"}}|identifies the mapping used by {{c|towlower}}}}
{{dsc end}}}}
{{dsc end}}

===Return value===
{{c|std::wctrans_t}} object suitable for use with {{lc|std::towctrans}} to map wide characters according to the named mapping of the current C locale or zero if {{c|str}} does not name a mapping supported by the current C locale.
